source_objects.description: Learn human resources with courses ranging from oracle human capital management to attracting, hiring and retaining the best people.

Sourcing Diversity talent on Linkedin, Facebook and Other communities
Diversity & Inclusion

items.title: Corporate Values And Ethics
items.headline: How to apply ethical behave and conduct in all our business and life
objectives_summary: Learn values and ethics in business
Learn basic workplace ethics for an organization
Importance of employee code of conduct

items.title: Informal and formal disciplinary meetings and investigations
items.headline: Successfully handling and resolving disciplinary issues in the workplace
objectives_summary: Understand when it’s appropriate to use informal resolution to address a disciplinary problem
Understand when it might be necessary to go down the formal disciplinary route and what this will entail
Know how to conduct a disciplinary investigation and write an investigation report

items.title: Proven People Management Process in small business
items.headline: Inspire,Engage your human resources towards performance culture through holistic  & proven people management process
objectives_summary: You will learn the reasons for high attrition and poor people engagement
You will appreciate the need for Holistic HR processes in your organization to drive people towards performance
You will learn the importance of manpower planning and the linkage with your business goal

items.title: How to design a Job Description !

items.headline: Details  to be captured while designing a Job description
objectives_summary: They will learn on how to design a Job description, and aspects related to JD that help in recruitment and managing manpower

items.title: Ten Step Succession Planning: HR’s Role as Facilitator

visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: Ten Step Succession Planning: HR’s Role as Facilitator of Long Term Talent Development.
objectives_summary: Explore how to define succession planning.
Identify the purpose and values of succession planning to corporate success.
Recognize the importance of the role of HR to lead succession plans.

items.title: Designing MicroLearning for the Evolving flow of Work

visible_instructors.job_title: Strategic L & D Consultant & Executive Coach
visible_instructors.title: Aparna Gupta
visible_instructors.name: Aparna

items.headline: Learn the importance and requirements of microlearning for the evolving flow of work and how to design for it.
objectives_summary: What is the goal of microlearning in the evolving flow of work?
What are the six criteria for effective microlearning in the flow of work?
Which five ‘info-learning’ formats qualify for delivering microlearning in the evolving flow of work?

items.title: Organization Development (OD): The Evaluation Phase

visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course discusses how evaluation of OD is a continuous and constant process of assessment.
objectives_summary: Identify the importance of the evaluation phase in understanding whether there has been a Return on Investment (ROI) from the Organization Development (OD) intervention
Explore the Organization Development (OD) evaluation phase as a continuous and constant process of assessment
Discover the Organization Development (OD) evaluation tool kit to evaluate progress at each stage of the OD cycle.

items.title: 13 Easy Steps to Transform New Hire to Superstar
items.headline: 13 Strategies to Greatly Accelerate Tapping into New Employees' Greatest Assets
objectives_summary: Create a brand new Onboarding program from scratch.
Witness measurable improvement in ramp-up time for new employees
Have employees that are driven and motivated toward the same objectives as the organization rather than just going through the motions.

items.title: Managing People in Business
items.headline: Human Capital Development. Templates, analytical tools and case examples are included
objectives_summary: Manage employees in the organization
Develop and implement human resource strategies and policies
Develop appropriate frameworks for planning and controlling human resource development, organizational communication and change in a variety of contexts

items.title: Enhancing Your Training and Facilitation Skills
items.headline: Tools, Concepts, and Knowledge for Mastering Training and Facilitation Skills
objectives_summary: Understand tthe  concept of Training and Development
Understand  your role  as a Facilitator/Trainer
Conducting Needs Assessment

items.title: I am an Ally: Embedding Allyship
items.headline: Embedding Allyship in our personal & professional lives including privilege, microaggressions, unconscious bias & more
objectives_summary: Allyship
Unconscious Bias
Microaggressions

items.title: What CEO Wants from Strategic Learning & Development?
items.headline: Execution steps to convert L&D function from a cost center to a strategic function as per CEO's expectations
objectives_summary: How you can build a L&D function which is as useful as a business function to the CEO?
How you can convert L&D function from a cost center to a strategic function of the organization?
How L&D can play a critical role to contribute to business growth in key business areas?

items.title: The Change Facilitator's Guide to How Learning Works

visible_instructors.title: Sarah Smith
visible_instructors.name: Sarah

items.headline: Reflections for coaches, facilitators and L&D/Talent teams around how to achieve sustainable deep-change learning
objectives_summary: Explore the process of learning and how successful facilitators can influence this
Build on existing knowledge of learning styles to reflect on how our personal preferences influence learning in the real world
Examine the processes of deeper learning and how these are different from more shallow forms of learning

items.headline: Part 4 of HIPAA and HITECH: Pathway to Compliance

items.title: Project Management and Leadership Development Course
items.headline: Master project management techniques and leadership skills by enrolling in this Project Management & Leadership course.
objectives_summary: Be a great manager and a team leader
Understand the techniques and methods you can use during management procedures
